content.raw:
I tried following the steps in [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup) to try out some simple teleoperation with a new install of Ignition. In both a docker container and local catkin install, it is not working \(tried with an Xbox One controller, which was working fine before with Gazebo and shows up with “jstest /dev/input/js0”\). There is no response to the robot's LED's, and no movement.

I see there is some commented code in the competition.ign launch file for the joystick plugin, and that code is not present in virtual\_stix.ign. Is this feature currently available?
content.html:
I tried following the steps in #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/ExampleSetup to try out some simple teleoperation with a new install of Ignition. In both a docker container and local catkin install, it is not working (tried with an Xbox One controller, which was working fine before with Gazebo and shows up with “jstest /dev/input/js0”). There is no response to the robot's LED's, and no movement.

I see there is some commented code in the competition.ign launch file for the joystick plugin, and that code is not present in virtual_stix.ign. Is this feature currently available?
